title: user login functionality
description: Verify that the user can successfully log in with valid email and password, and receives access and refresh tokens.

title: user registration process
description: Test the user registration endpoint to ensure new users can register with valid email, password, and confirmPassword fields.

title: refresh access token
description: Validate that the refresh token endpoint issues a new access token when provided with a valid refresh token.

title: get user profile
description: Check that authenticated users can retrieve their profile information using the profile endpoint.

title: update user profile
description: Ensure that authenticated users can update their profile details and the changes are persisted.

title: user logout functionality
description: Verify that the user can log out successfully, invalidating the current access and refresh tokens.

title: document upload and processing
description: Test uploading a document with metadata and verify that the document is stored, text extracted, and AI analysis is triggered.

title: get documents with filters
description: Validate retrieval of documents with pagination, search, category, and workspace filters applied.

title: ai chat message sending
description: Ensure that users can send chat messages in an AI chat session and receive context-aware responses.

title: create document comparison
description: Test the creation of a document comparison between two documents and verify similarity scoring and analysis generation.
